channel.title: Coming Soon? Live Amnesic Whonix Qubes
channel.description:
It looks like there will be a live amnesic Whonix Qubes coming soon?
Qubes team is developing and already released an alpha of a live amnesic version of Qubes OS.
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/qubes-devel/IQdCEpkooto
Qubes team is working on integrating Whonix into the official Qubes OS ISO this year.
https://github.com/rootkovska/qubes-roadmap
So does this mean that the live version of Qubes will give us a live amnesic version of Whonix Qubes?
This would be so cool!
Edited by Patrick: Changed title so it does not sound like an announcement.

item.title: Coming Soon? Live Amnesic Whonix Qubes

item.description:
Great, it looks like it is going to be exciting for Qubes + Whonix in the coming months!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Coming Soon? Live Amnesic Whonix Qubes
item.dc:creator: digitalqueen
item.description:
It looks like there will be a live amnesic Whonix Qubes coming soon?

Qubes team is developing and already released an alpha of a live amnesic version of Qubes OS.

https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/qubes-devel/IQdCEpkooto

Qubes team is working on integrating Whonix into the official Qubes OS ISO this year.

GitHub

rootkovska/qubes-roadmap

qubes-roadmap - High-level milestone planning for Qubes OS

So does this mean that the live version of Qubes will give us a live amnesic version of Whonix Qubes?

This would be so cool!

Edited by Patrick:
Changed title so it does not sound like an announcement.

Read full topic
